Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple class to represent a hand full of cards.

        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • sort

        public void sort()
        This method will sort a hand into ascending order. Will only work in Java 8 or higher. It makes the assumption that you have an array of N Cards named 'cards'; cards is a field.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] a)
